other_tests.findings: Small left pleural effusion; moderate dependent and subsegmental atelectasis in the bilateral lower lobes; significant peripancreatic fatty stranding, fluid, and thickening of the left perirenal fascia; hypoenhancement of the pancreatic tail compatible with necrosis; ill-defined intermediate density focus in the left lower quadrant likely representing scarring or fat necrosis; trace fluid in the left lower abdomen tracking to the pelvis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The ill-defined intermediate density focus in the left lower quadrant is grossly unchanged in appearance from previous imaging.
